title: 4shared.com write problem
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

After successful mount of cloud storage at 4shared.com via webdav backend write operation fails. Tested with duplicity backup program. Using other cloud storage (T-Online) via webdav works fine.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

rclone v1.52.2
- os/arch: linux/386
- go version: go1.14.4

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

Debian 10 32 bit

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

4shared.com

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

Related duplicity command and output:
Backing up /srv/ajtony ...

/usr/bin/duplicity full /srv/ajtony --exclude **/*.mp4 --exclude **/*.mp3 --exclude **/*.m3u --exclude **/*.wma --exclude **/*.wav --exclude **/*.flac --exclude **/*.iso --exclude **/Olah_*_20*.zip --exclude **/bozon/uploads/rita/*.* --exclude **/bozon/uploads/solymar/*.zip --exclude **Install/** --exclude **/webdav/** --exclude **/Olah_*/*_2009/** --exclude **/Olah_*/*_2010/** --exclude **/Olah_*/*_2011/** --exclude **/Olah_*/*_2012/** --exclude **/Olah_*/*_2013/** file:///srv/backup/4shared.com/srv/ajtony --encrypt-key ***something secret*** --allow-source-mismatch --archive-dir /srv/backup/.cache/duplicity --tempdir /srv/backup/temp --verbosity 4 --gpg-options "--compress-algo=zlib --compress-level=6 --cipher-algo=AES256 --digest-algo SHA512" --name something-full-2020-07-11T14:04:42 --volsize 150

Giving up after 5 attempts. IOError: [Errno 5] Input/output error
Local and Remote metadata are synchronized, no sync needed.
Last full backup date: none
Attempt 1 failed. IOError: [Errno 5] Input/output error
Attempt 2 failed. IOError: [Errno 5] Input/output error
Attempt 3 failed. IOError: [Errno 5] Input/output error
Attempt 4 failed. IOError: [Errno 5] Input/output error
Finisched backing up /srv/ajtony

Output of related df command:
df -hT /srv/backup/4shared.com
Filesystem     Type         Size  Used Avail Use% Mounted on
4shared:       fuse.rclone  1.0P     0  1.0P   0% /srv/backup/4shared.com

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

Related syslog fragment:
Jul 11 14:05:40 deruyter rclone[31558]: srv/ajtony/duplicity-full.20200711T120445Z.vol1.difftar.gpg: Failed to copy: Update mkParentDir failed: 409 Conflict
Jul 11 14:05:40 deruyter rclone[31558]: srv/ajtony/duplicity-full.20200711T120445Z.vol1.difftar.gpg: WriteFileHandle.New Rcat failed: Update mkParentDir failed: 409 Conflict
Jul 11 14:05:40 deruyter rclone[31558]: srv/ajtony/duplicity-full.20200711T120445Z.vol1.difftar.gpg: WriteFileHandle.Flush error: Update mkParentDir failed: 409 Conflict
Jul 11 14:06:14 deruyter rclone[31558]: srv/ajtony/duplicity-full.20200711T120445Z.vol1.difftar.gpg: Failed to copy: Update mkParentDir failed: 409 Conflict

Jul 11 14:06:48 deruyter rclone[31558]: srv/ajtony/duplicity-full.20200711T120445Z.vol1.difftar.gpg: Failed to copy: Update mkParentDir failed: 409 Conflict

Jul 11 14:07:23 deruyter rclone[31558]: srv/ajtony/duplicity-full.20200711T120445Z.vol1.difftar.gpg: WriteFileHandle.Flush error: Update mkParentDir failed: 409 Conflict
